channel.title: Databases on Number Theoretic Database for Twists and others
channel.description: Recent content in Databases on Number Theoretic Database for Twists and others

item.title: Database for Twists
item.description: Let $\mathcal B_k$ be the family of primitive Dirichlet characters of order $k$ and define $$\mathcal{B}_{k,N}(X) = \{\chi \in \mathcal B_k \mid \mathfrak{f}_\chi \leq X \text{ and } \text{gcd}(N, \mathfrak{f}_\chi)=1\}$$ where $\text{gcd}$ is the greatest common divisor function and $\mathfrak{f}_\chi$ is the conductor of $\chi$. Moreover, for a fixed $k$ denote $\zeta_k := e^{2 \pi i/k}$ and $Z_k := \big[0, \zeta_k, \zeta_k^2, \ldots, \zeta_k^{k-1}, 1\big]$. Let $E$ be an elliptic curve defined over $\mathbb{Q}$ of conductor $N$.

item.title: Database for Twists
item.description: Let $\mathcal B_k$ be the family of primitive Dirichlet characters of order $k$ and define $$\mathcal{B}_{k,N}(X) = \{\chi \in \mathcal B_k \mid \mathfrak{f}_\chi \leq X \text{ and } \text{gcd}(N, \mathfrak{f}_\chi)=1\}$$ where $\text{gcd}$ is the greatest common divisor function and $\mathfrak{f}_\chi$ is the conductor of $\chi$. Moreover, for a fixed $k$ denote $\zeta_k := e^{2 \pi i/k}$ and $Z_k := \big[0, \zeta_k, \zeta_k^2, \ldots, \zeta_k^{k-1}, 1\big]$. Let $E$ be an elliptic curve defined over $\mathbb{Q}$ of conductor $N$.
